c74object.name: sp.classifierdisplay
c74object.description: Displays the matched class using the Sensory Percussion zones/labels.

discussion.p: The sp.classifierdisplay object lets you visualize what classes have been matched by sp.classmatch. Can display the typical snare/tom classes as well as an option to visualize kick classes.

inlet.description: An incoming class name (with optional velocity) will flash on the UI.

outlet.description: Passes the incoming class (and velocity) directly out.

attribute.name: drum
attribute.digest: The type of drum to display the UI for
attribute.description:
Sets the type of drum to use for the UI display
Available options are snare, tom, and kick.
